json.text: Let me tell you guys about Alvin and for my personal friends watching this you know exactly who I'm talking about
So Alvin was my best friend back in grade six
I recently moved to a new school like two months into the year and
Coincidentally this other kid Alvin also moved in around the same time
I did we got put into the same classroom
But I guess no one told them because there weren't enough desks to accommodate the two new students
So for their temporary solution, they made us share one desk
It was Kinda awkward at first
But we became close friends pretty quick since we were both the newbies and also since we literally sat inches apart from each other
What I wish I realized sooner at the time was that Alvin was [a] total douche
[I] mean, we shared common interests like anime video games and whatever but Alvin
He had problems
He had a really sick and perverted sense of humor for his age
He had this chronic thirst for stealing, and he was uncomfortably really touchy-feely without realizing
it
There was one [time] we [had] to do a project and needed to work in pairs
The assignment was [to] build a bridge structure out of pasta
Luckily for me. I didn't have to work with Alvin on this project
Unluckily for my friend Marco who was Alvin's partner hot glue was involved in the construction [of] this bridge
So [on] the day of submission we all got to class with our bridges, and I see Marco with his arm bandaged
We're all like dude. What happened
Evil laugh
sizzle
SCREAM
SCREAM
Laugh
{ wtf dude }
Worst part of it was that after it happened [all] Alvin did was give Marco a band-aid which was like
1/4 the size of the actual burn and
[now] Marco has a scar on his [arm] to remind him not to be around Alvin when hot glue is in the vicinity
Alvin was a straight-up thief one time when YuGiOh was like the biggest fad in my school one of my friends
reported to us that he lost his blue-eyes white dragon and for a kid that was like losing [$1,000] a
Couple of days later alvin invited me to hang out at his house, and what do I spot on a shelf in his living room?
The bude and I knew alvin was not an avid Yugioh player
And if he was this dragon would be safely tucked away in a deck and not casually chillin beside a potted plant
Oh, hey, you have a blue-eyes oh
I've had that for a while now. He said
No, you didn't
during our
Friendship Alvin discovered my knack for art and saw that I drew pretty often and kept all my drawings in a folder in my desk
He had shown repeated interest in said drawings and often asked to see them
One day in Grade 7 in which we were in the same class again some of my drawings went missing
There were really only a few suspects, but Alvin was the main one on a later day
We had pe and afterwards I noticed someone was missing in the change room
When the rest of us made our way back [to] the classroom
Guess who was already there and once I sat back down on my desk guess what of more I was missing I
Knew it was him all of the clues pointed to him
I never found those drawings again, but every bone in my skeletal system believed. It was him I
Slowly stopped hanging around Alvin. He just seemed like a bad kid let alone a bad friend there was one time
He got into an argument with another kid and coughed on his pizza like a scumbag the kid told on him and Alvin cried
like a baby
The Following Year in Grade 8 Alvin and I along with the majority of her friends got
Separated because they built a new school nearby to accommodate the growing population in the area
Alvin stayed behind at Saint Barbara because he lived across the boundary line all my other friends and I moved to Saint Veronica
[we] had one year of solace away from Alvin because the high school we were going to the following year saint
Marcellinus brought together students from Several Elementary schools two of which were Saint Veronica, and
[Saint] Barbara
Yup
